tldr: Certain functions in the tanton_engine crate are unsound due to lack of sufficient boundary checks in public API. The tanton_engine crate is no longer maintained, so there are no plans to fix this issue.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `tanton_engine` package from your application.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
